content: ♥ this item is only the pattern of hatsune miku vocaloid you will receive pdf digital file 17 pages and +70 pictures pattern languages are avaible in english and portuguese brazil this pattern is for personal use only selling or sharing is prohibited you ll need to know the basics of crochet to be able to do it beginner-intermediate level if you will use similar yarn and hook size as me 2 5mm your amigurumi will be approx 18cm or 7 08in
